string.text: Anti-radiation drugs

Mexaminum radiation protection drugs are common in the Zone. When used, this drug induces contraction of peripheral blood vessels and oxygen deprivation, which serve to treat and prevent radiation exposure. The drug does not have severe side effects, although isolated cases of mild nausea, dizziness, cramps and stomach pain have been reported.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]HEALING:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] Depletes 5%hp on use
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
Bandage

A normal elastic bandage used to stop bleeding and prevent infection of wounds. For regular bleeding, carefully apply the bandage to the wound. For arterial bleeding, urgently tie the bandage around the affected area.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stops bleeding
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] temporarly patches your arms and legs
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (adhesive plaster)
Army Bandage

An elastic army bandage used to stop bleeding and prevent infection of wounds. For regular bleeding, carefully apply the bandage to the wound. For arterial bleeding, urgently tie the bandage around the affected area.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stops bleeding
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] temporarly patches your arms and legs
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (adhesive plaster)
Vinca

Ukrainian Vikasolum - an artificial equivalent of vitamin K. The main purpose of this drug is to increase blood coagulation speed. In great demand among stalkers who want slow-healing wounds and lacerations inflicted by mutants to close up faster. The effects of the drug are long-lasting and should be used preventivly.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stops bleeding
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes dizziness
Anabiotics

An experimental drug developed by Professor Ozersky for scientific research teams working in the Zone. At its core, the drug contains tetrodotoxin, known colloquially as "zombie powder," which causes a complete shutdown of the body's central nervous system that may allow people to survive emissions outside cover. After six years worth of field tests, thoughtful stalkers know to keep a few on hand for unexpected blowouts.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] zone-produced
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes temporary blackout
Psy-block

A drug that blocks avalanche-like nerve impulses. Consumption induces short-term loss of all emotion. Used exclusively in the Zone to counteract the effects of anomalous psy-fields. The effects of the drug are long-lasting. Take two tablets at a time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes extreme dizziness
Antidote

The IP2 antitoxin is a complex drug comprising several antidotes, including metoclopramidum, pyridoxine, thiamine, riboxin and other pharmaceuticals. The drug is used to inject a range of antibiotics to neutralise natural poisons, together with synthetic poison absorbers, into the bloodstream. IP2 is not particularly popular in the Zone as most stalkers rely on a gas mask and a protective suit. However, there are still those who have a few units of this antidote stashed for emergency situations. The effects of the drug are long-lasting. Take one capsule at a time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes dizziness
Hercules

The main component of this product is an anabolic androgen, an artificial steroid, the chemical composition of which resembles testosterone. Often used by stalkers during long raids to reduce muscle fatigue. Significantly increases weight-carrying capacity. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
Radioprotectant

B190 Indraline radioprotectant, included in medkits issued to nuclear power plant personnel. Used in the Zone instead of the excessively toxic PC1 cysteamine hydrochloride, repeated use of which often caused death. Reduces the effects of gamma radiation on live tissue. Best consumed before exposure, as effects are not instant, but the drug lasts a long time. Take one capsule at a time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild dizziness
Ibuprofen

Is a medication in the nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) class that is used for treating pain, fever and inflammation.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[0,74,134,232] post-heals %c[ui_gray_2] H%c[0,74,134,232] 60% %c[ui_gray_2]T%c[0,74,134,232] 60% %c[ui_gray_2]A%c[0,74,134,232] 60% %c[ui_gray_2]L%c[0,74,134,232] 60% 
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] painkillers
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] average damage resistance bonus
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (dispersible tablets)
Grizzly

Travel Grizzly Medical Kit is considered one of the best first aid kits. It contains everything necessary to provide timely medical care in extreme conditions. Now on SALE.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]CONTENTS:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] bandage
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] salewa medkit

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] vinca

 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] storage for medical equipment
Medical Case

This medical case is a specialiced battery cooled hardcase which contains all available pen injectors. For trained personel and paramedics only. Now on SALE.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] morphine
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] adrenalin
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] combat stim red

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] eTG-c
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] storage for medical equipment
Old first aid bag

This old first aid shoulder bag contains everything which is needed in the harsh enviroment of the zone. From radiation to chemical or fire protection. Some surgical instruments aswell as a military grade bandage is also included. Now on SALE.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] army bandage
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] ai-2 medkit
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] surgical instruments

 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] storage for medical equipment
Medical Waste

Hazardous medical waste. Because of the zones enviroment the use of medical items are pretty common. And so is the waste which is left over all around the zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medical waste
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] high chance of hurting yourself or getting an infection
CMS

Compact surgical kit for treatment of bullet wounds and other serious injuries.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[0,252,186,3] first-aid %c[ui_gray_2] H%c[0,252,186,3] 60% %c[ui_gray_2]T%c[0,252,186,3] 60% 
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] surgical item

 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] permanent aid kit for head and torso
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (field kit)
Surgical Instruments

Small variation of surgical instrument which are common in the zone. They are used to craft the Surv12 and the CMS kit. Can be directly used, but it will require a bandage and the instruments aren't sterile anymore. So they can be used only one time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[0,74,134,232] post-heals %c[ui_gray_2] H%c[0,74,134,232] 10% %c[ui_gray_2]T%c[0,74,134,232] 10% %c[ui_gray_2]A%c[0,74,134,232] 10% %c[ui_gray_2]L%c[0,74,134,232] 10%

Antibiotics

Complex and versatile antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] agonistic effect
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes a short-term clouding of consciousness
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (dispersible tablets)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] small damage resistance bonus
IFAK

IFAK is a personal medical kit issued to soldiers in service. The official first aid kit in the US Marine Corps IFAK (Individual First Aid Kit of the United States Marine Corps). The latest, third generation (gen3), the most well designed and rich in contents.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (field kit)
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow prolonged health recovery time
AI-2

The AI-2 medkit was developed as a standart service first aid kit for various defence and law enforcement agencies and civil defense forces of USSR. In case of all-out conflict with the use of weapons of mass destruction it should have been disturbed to the population of the affected and surrounding areas.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (field kit injector)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow prolonged health recovery time
Car

Like a fire extinguisher, car first aid kit is crucially important protection measure in the event of an emergency on the road.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (field kit)
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow prolonged health recovery time
Salewa

First aid kit containing various types of bandages an dressing tools.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (field kit)
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow prolonged health recovery time
Small glucose shot

Glucose shots are used in cases of severe diabetic hypoglycaemia, but can also be employed as a stimulant. Instant induction of carbohydrates entails a rapid boost of energy, thus allowing the user to undertake increased physical effort and withstand stress. Due to its convenient means of administration, they can be used in combat situations. This makes glucose shot a very good way to speed-up the healing process.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
Large glucose shot

Glucose shots are used in cases of severe diabetic hypoglycaemia, but can also be employed as a stimulant. Instant induction of carbohydrates entails a rapid boost of energy, thus allowing the user to undertake increased physical effort and withstand stress. Due to its convenient means of administration, they can be used in combat situations. This makes glucose shot a very good way to speed-up the healing process.

 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
Combat Stimulant

Combat stimulant. Is used for gaining strength and endurance before combat for about 3 minutes. Stimulant is allowed to use by the special forces units. Develeped by Svarog Test Labs, marked as SJ1. Has side effects.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] good damage resistance bonus
Combat Stimulant

Combat stimulant. Mixed with a small amount of adrenalin it is used to increase the body abilities before combat for about 3 minutes. The stimulant is allowed to use by the special forces units. Develeped by Svarog Test Labs, marked as SJ6. Has side effects.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] very good damage resistance bonus
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] stamina bonus
Propital

Military issue drug. It stimulates regeneration processes by increasing the biosynthesis of purine and pyrimidine bases, RNA, functional and enzymatic cell elements. Increases metabolism, health and vitality. It has long-term side effects. Permitted to use only by medical officers and paramedics.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] rapid health recovery time
027 R pills

A package of alprazolam 0.25 mg tablets, also known as 027 R. Alprazolam is known among chemists for its ability to reduce depression, anxiety and panic disorders. Invaluable for anyone exploring Yantar, Radar, the Red Forest or any of the underground labs. Side effects include sleepiness. Best taken with water, but some stalkers opt for caffeine instead.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] immediate sleepiness induction
Cocaine

Small aluminium case containing cocaine and the tools facilitating use. Cocaine is a powerful nervous system stimulant. Its effects can last from 15-30 minutes to an hour, depending on the route of administration. Cocaine increases alertness, induces feelings of well-being, competence and sexuality. Anxiety, paranoia and restlessness are common side effects. With excessive dosage, tremors, convulsions and increased body temperature are observed. Bandits are known for sniffing this drug right before launching an assault or ambush.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] very potent alcohol sobering effect
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slight health reduction on use
Adrenalin

Sterile disposable syringe with a dose of adrenalin - the main hormone of the adrenal medulla. It is used to enhance the physiological response associated with the preperation of all muscles to increased activity. Relieves the sensation of pain.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] strong stamina boost
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] decreases fatigue
Morphine

Single-use syringe full of morphine - powerful drug used primarly to tread both acute and chronic severe pain.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[0,74,134,232] post-heals %c[ui_gray_2] H%c[0,74,134,232] 100% %c[ui_gray_2]T%c[0,74,134,232] 100% %c[ui_gray_2]A%c[0,74,134,232] 100% %c[ui_gray_2]L%c[0,74,134,232] 100%

 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] long lasting
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes temporary blackout
eTG-Change

Pen injector which contains a mix of different steroids and other ingredients. Guess nobody wants to know exactly what is in it. The main point is that it works.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] strong increased carryweight
Caffeine tablets

Caffeine and sodium benzoate which cause central nervous to work with highest effectiveness possible at a given time. Reduce sleepiness to a large degree. Take two tablets at one time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] potent alcohol sobering effect
Alu splint (Arms)

Common splint for fixing the damaged bones in positions as an emergency aid measure.

 %c[d_blue] • %c[0,74,134,232] post-heals %c[ui_gray_2]A%c[0,74,134,232] 10%

 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast and permanent
Painkillers

The most cheap and widely spread painkillers.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[0,74,134,232] post-heals %c[ui_gray_2] H%c[0,74,134,232] 40% %c[ui_gray_2]T%c[0,74,134,232] 40% %c[ui_gray_2]A%c[0,74,134,232] 40% %c[ui_gray_2]L%c[0,74,134,232] 40%

Hazardous medical waste. Because of the zones enviroment the use of medical items are pretty common. And so is the waste which is left over all around the zone.

Hazardous medical waste. Because of the zones enviroment the use of medical items are pretty common. And so is the waste which is left over all around the zone.

 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medical waste
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] high chance of hurting yourself or getting an infection
Cannabis joint

Known for their relaxing effects, joints are used by stalkers recreationally, especially those who frequent the Barrier or the Red Forest beyond it. Induces a soothing effect if combined with alcohol. Increases hunger.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] zone-produced
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
Zagustin

Military issue drug. Inhibitis activators of profibinolysin and slows down its transformation in fibrinolysin. Temporarily stops bleeding and increases resistance to bloodloss. Has side effects. Leads to severe dehydration.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stops bleeding immediately
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
Vaselin

HOPKA Vaselin, or more precisely, petroleum jelly, is a very ointment used for a number of purposes where its water insulation and lubrication properities are required. For instance treating small cuts and burns, coating corrosion-prone items or lubricating gear that requires non-acidic lubricants.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] external medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] repair item, lubrication
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] burn protection bonus
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
Splint (Legs)

Common splint for fixing the damaged bones in positions as an emergency aid measure.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[0,74,134,232] post-heals %c[ui_gray_2]L%c[0,74,134,232] 10% 
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] minor external leg fix
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast and permanent
Marijuana

Self-grown cannabis. Smoking it is a popular pastime, especially among Freedomers who've served at the Barrier. Marijuana bags can be bought here and there in the Zone. Some believe that the drug helps retain a balance of the mind.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (prolonged inhalation)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] potent alcohol sobering effect
